conclusion: Analyze current orientation of shadows relative to light source and objects
Shadow A from the egg is positioned directly below the egg
Shadow B from the apple is positioned directly below the apple
Shadow C from the baseball is positioned directly below the baseball
Shadow D from the microphone is positioned directly below the microphone
Shadow A will shift to the left horizontally when light source moves to the right
Shadow B will shift to the left horizontally when light source moves to the right
Shadow C will shift to the left horizontally when light source moves to the right
Shadow D will remain in the same position when light source moves to the right
Final answer: Shadows A, B, C will shift left; Shadow D remains unchanged
